ch0004_40_toko/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s get out
there and do our best today, as always!
ch0004_40_toko/0101_0701_02_10:
We can make this day a memory as precious as a
shining diamond!
ch0004_40_toko/7101_0701_01_10:
I wonder if there’s a princess out there who’s a
strong Pokémon Trainer. If there is, I’d sure love
to battle her!
ch0004_40_toko/7101_0701_02_10:
Maybe I should ask Lear! He’s a strong Trainer—
and isn’t he also a prince, too? He might
know someone!
ch0004_40_toko/7102_0701_01_10:
It’s really hard to eat while wearing such a
fancy costume.
ch0004_40_toko/7102_0701_02_10:
But Glacia is always wearing a fancy dress, and
she can eat an entire Mauville Ramen Bowl
without getting a drop of broth on her clothes!
ch0004_40_toko/7102_0701_03_10:
There must be a trick to it. I guess I need
more practice!
ch0004_40_toko/7103_0701_01_10:
Rosa told me that she starred in some movies at
Pokéstar Studios—and that she wore a princess
dress in one of them.
ch0004_40_toko/7103_0701_02_10:
If I ever have the chance to go there, I want to be
in a movie while wearing this dress. I’m sure that
would be a great memory!
ch0004_40_toko/7104_0701_01_10:
Lisia and Dawn came up to me when they saw my
new costume, and they said that I should enter a
contest with Diancie and wear it there.
ch0004_40_toko/7104_0701_02_10:
That sounds fun and all, but I’m kinda worried
that Diancie might stand out too much... What if
someone bad tries to steal it?
ch0004_40_toko/7104_0701_03_10:
I wonder if I could use Props to disguise Diancie
like in a Pokémon Musical...
ch0004_40_toko/7105_0701_01_10:
What do you think about my costume,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Be honest!
ch0004_40_toko/7105_0701_02_10:
Hm. I see. You think it looks cool when it sparkles
as I’m battling, huh?
ch0004_40_toko/7105_0701_04_10:
I’m glad my costume is pretty or cute or whatever,
but what I really love is that it catches everyone’s
eye while I’m battling!
ch0004_40_toko/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, hey! There’s something I wanted to give you.
ch0004_40_toko/1701_0702_01_10:
Diancie and I found this. Use it if you think it’ll
come in handy!
ch0004_40_toko/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve never really worn frilly clothes like this before.
It was really tough at first...
ch0004_40_toko/2501_0701_02_10:
But now, I love this dress! And it goes perfectly
with Diancie!
ch0004_40_toko/2501_0702_01_10:
I have newfound respect for Trainers like Diantha
and Elesa who wear all kinds of different outfits
for their jobs.
ch0004_40_toko/2501_0702_02_10:
After wearing this costume for a while, I’ve
realized that clothes like this aren’t just pretty—
they also take a lot of work!
ch0004_40_toko/2511_0701_01_10:
Diancie is a sudden transformation of a Pokémon
called Carbink.
ch0004_40_toko/2511_0701_02_10:
Because they’re such rare Pokémon, bad people
are always trying to steal them.
ch0004_40_toko/2511_0701_03_10:
As long as I’m with my Diancie, there’s no way
any thieves are going to get their grubby little
hands on it!
ch0004_40_toko/2511_0702_01_10:
Diancie and I have battled together lots of times,
and it’s gotten really strong. There’s no way we’d
lose to someone who wanted to steal it...
ch0004_40_toko/2511_0702_02_10:
but if we’re ever in trouble, promise you’ll help
me protect Diancie!
ch0004_40_toko/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I’m looking forward to 
a bunch more Pokémon battles today!
ch0004_40_toko/3003_0701_01_10: Hi! Now that you’re here, let’s go have some fun!
ch0004_40_toko/3005_0701_01_10: Hey! Is it that late already? Time sure does fly!
